modName: Ghost Armor and Weapon Set WIP
summary: Three Ghostly Armors, Three GhostlySummon  Spells, Three Ghostly Weapons, Ghostly Horse Mount
descriptionHtml:
All items are stored in special coffins right across from the Whiterun carriage location

**************************************************************************************************************************Contents
**************************************************************************************************************************
Three Ghostly Armor sets
     Phantom Armor : Blue/White Ghost Fx
     Wraith Armor : Purple Ghost FX
     Poltergeist Armor : Red Ghost FX

Tree Ghostly Summon Spells
     Summon Phantom
     Summon Wraith
     Summon Poltergeist

Three Ghostly Weapons
     Ghastly Ripper : two handed battle axe
     Ghastly Shredder : one handed sword
     Ghastly Reaper : Bow

New GHostly Follower : The Phantom Stranger

New Ghostly Horse : the Phantasmal Steed


**************************************************************************************************************************

Change Log


**************************************************************************************************************************
Version v2.5b
**************************************************************************************************************************
) Fixed the summons to show correct colors

) Removed Spirit Rend spell { it caused a fatal error when opening the magic menu}

) Chests have correct number of items

) Still no summon ability for the Phantom Steed,......im becoming disgruntled and may explode,..
**************************************************************************************************************************
Version v2.5
**************************************************************************************************************************
) Added lighting effects at coffins

) Added new spell, Spirit Rend, which will allow the player to change NPC\'s into Ghosts for 1 day{doesnt seem to work for everyone, leave feed back please so this can be resolved}

) Toned down the mounts speed so you arnt literally flying all over Tamriel

) The Phantom Stranger is now a functioning follower who can summon his own Phantom!

) All Items are now upgradeable at workbench and grinder for a few Ebony ingots and 1 ectoplasm a peice

) Armors can now be disenchanted to add any of the three Ghost effects to anything you want!

**************************************************************************************************************************
New version v2
**************************************************************************************************************************

All items are stored in special coffins right across from the Whiterun carriage location and im STILL working on figuring out how to script the phantasmal steed as a rideable mount summon spell but the solution has eluded me all day so screw it ,..heres what i have so far,.......

**************************************************************************************************************************

This file is mostly uploaded so my partner can acess my files from his home AND get feed back from the community
